1.content: You were walking home one day from college since you had a long day of nonstop classes. As you were walking home, you were listening to some jazz music to calm your nerves. After a couple of hours, you got home, opened the door before closing it as you yelled to your sister that you were home but you heard no answer. You soon thought that she was at her boyfriend's place leaving you home alone for the night. You went to your room and threw your bag onto your bed as you walked into your bathroom which was connected to your room. Thankfully, you had your own bathroom as you turned on the shower before getting in and started to wash yourself. Another hour passed as you turned off the shower before stepping out and drying yourself off. After you placed the towel around your body, you noticed something was wrong. So you opened the door from your bathroom that leads into your bedroom but instead of seeing your bedroom, you saw a bunch of doors that wasn't there before. So you walked down the hallway and noticed the names above each door and was shocked that these doors lead to anime's which got you to have an idea which was to leave your old life. Which door do you go through?
1.title: Anime Hallway

choices: Keep looking, you know their are other options available...
11.content:
Stepping into the corridor, you examine it: it had a bright red carpet, light white skirting board and the walls, that seemed to go on forever, were lined with fancy, heavy, brown doors with small golden plaques with the names of anime engraved into each one: Your Lie in April, Dragon Ball, Cowbo- wait then you see something you recognise instantly.

Fairy Tail, the anime about the guild of mages and their constant wacky and wonderful adventures. After all you'd watched it for nearly ten years: It was defiantly at the top of your list. Stepping through the heavy oak door, you feel the world around you peel away until their is nothing. No feelings at all. Not even your own hair on your neck...

You begin to panic. Are you dead? Are you alive? if you are dead if this heaven or some kind of torture in hell? You look down at you hands only to see a slight shimmering outline, no colour or even solid form. You are now a ghost.

Your mind comes to a rest when your vision returns: You are now standing in the main hall of the Fairy Tail Guild... You glide around before nearly bumping into Lucy. The sudden pull gives you an idea: try and possess someone...


Who do you possess?
11.title: Fairytail

12.content:
Walking down the corridor's bright red carpet, you look at the heavy oak doors with small gold plaques located at eye level: each one was embossed with the name of different anime that you recognised : Pokemon, Danganronpa, Jojo's Bizzare Adventure, and some that you never even hear of: Duranrara, Kakeguri, Gurren Lagann...

You weren't sure why but you knew, but if you knew that if you stepped through one of these doors you'd throw off your old life and start a new one...

Arriving at the door with RWBY written on it you take the plunge, pushing open the door and marching through. The feeling hit: It was like walking into a brick wall, yet unlike with a brick wall you felt yourself walking through it yet when you finally got through it was as if you'd lost something when you were passing through. Something that was weighing you down...

Looking down at your hands you realise that you've turned into a ghost, lost your physical self along the way, as if you'd shed it.

Finally looking around the room you were now floating in, you reconsidered it as the title teams bedroom mainly due to the precarious bunk bed contraptions they'd set up. Moving closer you can see the four sleeping forms lying in each bed, their forms shifting in a slow, calm rhythm.

Moving you hand closer to one of the forms, you can feel a pull as if you could just slip right in... Pulling your hand away, you observe the form closer unable to see anything other than the colour of the hair splayed over the pillow... What colour is it?
12.title: RWBY

choices: Try and talk to your fellow Huntresses.

Your senses are lit ablaze by the rush of feelings: the soft sheets draped over your form, the feeling of once again having a bountiful chest, even the horrid feeling of some stray hairs in your new mouth.

Sitting up, you see a sudden flush of yellow hair overcome you vision: Yang's hair. Now your hair. Gripping your new chest you an feel the unnatural perkiness to the breasts even though they were smaller than your old ones... What do you do next?

info.brief_description: One day, you get sucked into a hallway which leads to different animes that you go into.
info.description:
You get sucked into a hallway which leads into different anime's which then allows you to possess girls' of that anime and have some fun in their body.

Main Characters:

Kimberly Gillsmore (You): 18 year old girl who has no girlfriend yet as you are bisexual. You have only one sister that you live with as you have long black hair that is tied into a ponytail. You listen to Country and Jazz music. You have DD cups which are just slightly bigger than your sister.

Naomi Gillsmore: Your 20 year old sister. She has a boyfriend who she invites over to the house when your parents are gone for the weekend. She has Pink hair which goes past her shoulder to please her boyfriend.

Jenny Smith: Your crush. 20 years old and have EE cups like you. You and Jenny have talked during your English class but outside of it to where she can know you, not even once you've guys talked.

Rules:

1. Do not kill Kimberly.

2. Once she possesses an anime girl, refer her to the girl she possessed

3. Don't make it a one-liner. Please make an attempt of making it a paragraph.

PS: If you want to add another character, please message me.

If I see an rude or a one-liner chapters at all, I will delete it right there on the spot.
